title: Greek Athletes and the Olympic Ideal
description: A quick win: understand Greek Athletes and the Olympic Ideal.

hook.text: In 776 BC, Greece held the first Olympic Games. Athletes competed naked, oiled, and in peak physical form.

buildup.text: The Greeks believed a strong body reflected a strong mind. Physical education was mandatory for citizens.
